import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Consumer } from "./context"; import { v4 as uuid } from "uuid"; import AdminNavigation from "./AdminNavigation"; class AddEvent extends Component { state = { eid:"", ename: "", edesc: "", edate: "", etime: "", eimg:"", rid: "", enp: "", ewin: "", elocation:"", evid:"", submitMessage: "", submitMessageTextColor: "", }; onChange = (event) => { this.setState({ [event.target.name]: event.target.value, }); }; onSubmit = (handler, event) => { event.preventDefault(); let isSuccessful = true; if (isSuccessful) { this.setState({ submitMessage: `Event published successfully`, submitMessageTextColor: "text-info", }); } else { this.setState({ submitMessage: "Publish failed :(", submitMessageTextColor: "text-danger", }); } const newEvent = { eid: uuid(), ename: this.state.ename, edesc: this.state.edesc, edate: this.state.edate, etime: this.state.etime, eimg:this.state.eimg, rid: this.state.rid, enp: this.state.enp, ewin: this.state.ewin, elocation: this.state.elocation, evid: this.state.evid, }; handler("ADD_EVENT", newEvent); }; render() { return ( {(value) => { const { //eid, ename, edesc, edate, etime, eimg, rid, enp, ewin, elocation, evid, submitMessage, submitMessageTextColor, } = this.state; const { handler } = value; return (

Add Event

{submitMessage}

{ename}

{edate} {etime}

); }} ); } } export default AddEvent;
